::Spears::

She reeled her head around and looked at Firearm. "Stasis lock? Why 
would I need to go into stasis lock? Surely the ship's sensors would 
know me as a maximal?"  she sighed and knew it was pointless to 
argue. "Well, if I have to go in and be in stasis. I guess I'd like 
to get closer before I get knocked out."  she sighed. "I hope Striker 
will be ok.  I miss him."

Though her trainer side missed Prebon.  


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm::
> 
> "Uh..." Firearm stares at Spears for a bit before shaking his head. 
> She was behaving in a very strange manner. "Fine, a few attacks, 
but 
> not even a scratch on the hull."
> 
> "We need to get you in stasis," he says, not wanting to waste time, 
> "Do you wanna be put in stasis now or when we get closer to the CF."
> 
>
